verses.verse: And he said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Come up <S%H5927><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> thou, <S%H859><s%> and Aaron, <S%H175><s%> Nadab, <S%H5070><s%> and Abihu, <S%H30><s%> and seventy <S%H7657><s%> of the elders <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2205><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> and worship <S%H7812><s%> ye afar off. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7350><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> alone <S%H905><s%> shall come near <S%H5066><s%> <S%H413><s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> but they <S%H1992><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> come nigh; <S%H5066><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall the people <S%H5971><s%> go up <S%H5927><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> him.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> came <S%H935><s%> and told <S%H5608><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the judgments: <S%H4941><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> with one <S%H259><s%> voice, <S%H6963><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> All <S%H3605><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath said <S%H1696><s%> will we do. <S%H6213><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> wrote <S%H3789><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and rose up early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning, <S%H1242><s%> and built <S%H1129><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the hill, <S%H2022><s%> and twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> pillars, <S%H4676><s%> according to the twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And he sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H853><s%> young men <S%H5288><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> which offered <S%H5927><s%> burnt offerings, <S%H5930><s%> and sacrificed <S%H2076><s%> peace <S%H8002><s%> offerings <S%H2077><s%> of oxen <S%H6499><s%> unto the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> half <S%H2677><s%> of the blood, <S%H1818><s%> and put <S%H7760><s%> it in basins; <S%H101><s%> and half <S%H2677><s%> of the blood <S%H1818><s%> he sprinkled <S%H2236><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> the altar. <S%H4196><s%>

And he took <S%H3947><s%> the book <S%H5612><s%> of the covenant, <S%H1285><s%> and read <S%H7121><s%> in the audience <S%H241><s%> of the people: <S%H5971><s%> and they said, <S%H559><s%> All <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath said <S%H1696><s%> will we do, <S%H6213><s%> and be obedient. <S%H8085><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> the blood, <S%H1818><s%> and sprinkled <S%H2236><s%> it on <S%H5921><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Behold <S%H2009><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> of the covenant, <S%H1285><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath made <S%H3772><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> you concerning <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> words. <S%H1697><s%>

Then went up <S%H5927><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron, <S%H175><s%> Nadab, <S%H5070><s%> and Abihu, <S%H30><s%> and seventy <S%H7657><s%> of the elders <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2205><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%>

And they saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> and there was under <S%H8478><s%> his feet <S%H7272><s%> as it were a paved <S%H3840><s%> work <S%H4639><s%> of a sapphire stone, <S%H5601><s%> and as it were the body <S%H6106><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> in his clearness. <S%H2892><s%>

And upon <S%H413><s%> the nobles <S%H678><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> he laid <S%H7971><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> his hand: <S%H3027><s%> also they saw <S%H2372><s%> <S%H853><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> and did eat <S%H398><s%> and drink. <S%H8354><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Come up <S%H5927><s%> to <S%H413><s%> me into the mount, <S%H2022><s%> and be <S%H1961><s%> there: <S%H8033><s%> and I will give <S%H5414><s%> thee <S%H853><s%> tables <S%H3871><s%> of stone, <S%H68><s%> and a law, <S%H8451><s%> and commandments <S%H4687><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have written; <S%H3789><s%> that thou mayest teach <S%H3384><s%> them.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> rose up, <S%H6965><s%> and his minister <S%H8334><s%> Joshua: <S%H3091><s%> and Moses <S%H4872><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the mount <S%H2022><s%> of God. <S%H430><s%>

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the elders, <S%H2205><s%> Tarry <S%H3427><s%> ye here <S%H2088><s%> for us, until <S%H5704><s%> <S%H834><s%> we come again <S%H7725><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> you: and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> and Hur <S%H2354><s%> are with <S%H5973><s%> you: if any <S%H4310><s%> man <S%H1167><s%> have any matters <S%H1697><s%> to do, let him come <S%H5066><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them.
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the mount, <S%H2022><s%> and a cloud <S%H6051><s%> covered <S%H3680><s%> <S%H853><s%> the mount. <S%H2022><s%>

And the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> abode <S%H7931><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> mount <S%H2022><s%> Sinai, <S%H5514><s%> and the cloud <S%H6051><s%> covered <S%H3680><s%> it six <S%H8337><s%> days: <S%H3117><s%> and the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> he called <S%H7121><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> out of the midst <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8432><s%> of the cloud. <S%H6051><s%>

And the sight <S%H4758><s%> of the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was like devouring <S%H398><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> on the top <S%H7218><s%> of the mount <S%H2022><s%> in the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> went <S%H935><s%> into the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the cloud, <S%H6051><s%> and got him up <S%H5927><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the mount: <S%H2022><s%> and Moses <S%H4872><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> in the mount <S%H2022><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> and forty <S%H705><s%> nights. <S%H3915><s%>
